ValidationRule.description: Requires further explanation why a lost opportunity was labeled as Other or No Interest.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (OR(ISPICKVAL( Reason_Lost__c , "Other"), ISPICKVAL( Reason_Lost__c , "No Interest"), ISPICKVAL( Reason_Lost__c , "Not a Fit"), ISPICKVAL( Reason_Lost__c , "No Budget")), ISBLANK( Why_I_Lost_this_Deal__c ), RecordTypeId = "012G0000000qERi")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Reason Lost is Other, No Interest, No Budget or Not a Fit the field "Why I Lost this Deal" needs to be populated for opportunity to be saved.
